content:
This change affects the first printing. Revised text is highlighted.

Read one entry based on how many days have passed since receiving JOURNEY (ALLUVIAL RUINS):

0 - 1: You climb to the top of the ruined tower Aell described, careful to avoid the reclaimers nesting throughout the ruins. You see Aell sitting in a small, well-concealed shelter. He beckons you over. "I made good time on my errand," he says, patting a cloth-wrapped conduit lying next to him. "I'm glad you did the same." He leans close. "You weren't kidding. There are so many reclaimers here!"

2+: You climb to the top of the ruined tower Aell described, careful to avoid the reclaimers nesting throughout the ruins. You see Aell sleeping in a small, well-concealed shelter. You shake him awake, and he startles before recognizing you. "There you are!" he hisses. "I've been waiting for days; what took you so long? There are reclaimers everywhere!"

Aell leads you to the edge of the tower, and you look down into a vast pit teeming with reclaimers consuming the heart of the ruins. "This is going to be dangerous," Aell says, and you agree. "Do you want to rest before we begin? We only have one shot at this."

A) Rest first (ends the day).

You set up camp beside Aell's shelter, and lie down for what will surely be a fitful night's sleep.

Complete the JOURNEY (ALLUVIAL RUINS) mission, and gain the WASHED AWAY mission. Record 1.21 above the next day on the day track.

End the day. You are considered to have camped.

B) There is no time to waste!

You lock eyes with Aell and nod to each other. He carefully unwraps what appears to be a long wooden cylinder, woven through with delicate copper wire. He picks it up, and it makes a hissing sound like a far-off deluge. The hairs on your arms start to rise as he begins to channel through the conduit, and you can feel the humidity rise and the wind pick up.

"Position yourself upstream," he says. It may take hours for the flooding to begin. Once it does, you're going to need to direct the flow of water for maximum effect. Otherwise, this whole place may be washed away, or we may not hit the nest at all!"

Aell adjusts his hat and flashes a confident smile. "Just let me know if you need assistance. And keep those reclaimers off of me!" With that, he raises his conduit, and the skies instantly darken.

Clear Aell with   to move a Flood card.

Complete the JOURNEY (ALLUVIAL RUINS) mission, and gain the WASHED AWAY mission. Replace the current weather with Downpour (if it is not already in play).

Search the Marsh of Rebirth set for Aell, Ambitious Shaper, and put him into play within reach of a Ranger of your choice. Do not read his entry. Search the General set for all Reclaimers, and shuffle them into the path deck.

Finally, after you have completed arrival setup, search the General set for one Flood, and put it into play.
